lead_paragraph: It wasn't until he was 22 years old, after a successful career as a street skateboarder in London, that Matt Stuart took up photography. He was inspired by the work of Robert Frank and Henri Cartier-Bresson.
snippet: London? Funny? If you are as practiced - and as patient - as Matt Stuart, the answer is yes. Christopher F. Schuetze explains.

headline.main: London, Very Dry, With a Twist

abstract: London? Funny? If you are as practiced - and as patient - as Matt Stuart, the answer is yes. Christopher F. Schuetze explains.
